pages.text: $(li)The Fire Protection enchantment can be applied in any kind of Helmet, Chestplate, Leggins, Boots, $(l:patchouli:weapons/shield)$(l:patchouli:weapons/shield)Shields$(/l)$(/l), $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/leather_horse_armor)$(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/leather_horse_armor)Horse Armors$(/l)$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:pets/revamped_wolf/leather_wolf_armor)$(l:patchouli:pets/revamped_wolf/leather_wolf_armor)Wolf Armors$(/l)$(/l).$(br)$(li)This enchantment reduces the burn damage receives and the duration when you receives the burn effect.
pages.title: Fire Protection

pages.text: $(li)By default, it can be upgrade just until level IV.$(br)$(li)You can raise the level V of this enchantment using an $(l:patchouli:enchanting/quark/ancient_tome_fire_protection)Ancient Tome (Fire Protection)$(/l).
